shortDescription: Buffer overflow in the YMP Datagrid ActiveX control (datagrid.dll) in Yahoo! JukeBox 2.2.2.56 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long argument to the AddButton method, a different vulnerability than CVE-2008-0623.
vulnerabilityName: yahoo music_jukebox Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
